text: Bagua, or "ba gua", is a fundamental philosophical concept in Chinese culture. Bagua may also refer to: * Baguazhang (Ba gua zhang), shortly Bagua, a Chinese martial art based on Ba gua's principles * Bakkwa, a salty-sweet dried meat product from China similar to pork jerky * Bagua, Peru, a town in Amazonas Region, Peru * Bagua District, a district in Bagua Province, Peru * Bagua Province, province in Amazonas Region, Peru * Bagua Grande, a town in Amazonas Region, Peru * Plain of Bagua, Peru * Bagua Anantapur, a town in Rangpur Division, Bangladesh
title: Bagua (disambiguation)
